messages.title: No tax on the first £10k you earn.
messages.content: So, on average, you'll have 700 more of these a year!

keyPolicies.policyDescription: No tax on the first £10k you earn, which should result in an average of £700 more per year for individuals.

mentions.candidate: You'll be quids in if you vote Keith Angus for Hackney.

issues.economy: No tax on the first £10k you earn, which means on average, you'll have £700 more a year.

images.caption: Liberal Democrats campaign coin with the text 'ONE POUND' and a large pound symbol in the center.
